## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G01360](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G01360)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>TBL3</u>
- **Gene Name:** TRICHOME BIREFRINGENCE-LIKE 3
- **Description:**   trichome birefringence-like protein (DUF828);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2179172
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
